function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of inter-species transmission of contagious diseases in the Cantanhez National Park due to proximity between wildlife and humans.","Impact":"Potential outbreak of infectious diseases among wildlife and park personnel.","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict health protocols and training park guards to minimize the risk of inter-species transmission.","Technologies":"Health monitoring tools, remote sensing technology for wildlife monitoring.","People":"Park guards, wildlife, local communities, conservation agencies, tour guides.","Owner":"Conservation agencies, national park management."},{"Description":"Reduced presence of international researchers leading to a potential lack of expertise and knowledge in conservation and wildlife management.","Impact":"Diminished research capacity and expertise in conservation projects and wildlife management.","Mitigation":"Enhancing investment in training and education of local researchers, strengthening their role in international projects, and reducing reliance on international researchers.","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, remote collaboration tools, virtual training modules.","People":"Local researchers, international researchers, conservation organizations.","Owner":"Local research institutions, conservation agencies."},{"Description":"Potential economic impact on tourism-dependent economies like the Seychelles due to reduced tourism activity.","Impact":"Economic downturn, loss of livelihoods, and reduced investment in conservation efforts.","Mitigation":"Diversifying the tourism industry, innovative approaches such as live feeds of biodiversity to international platforms, and development of alternative tourism packages.","Technologies":"Live streaming technology, online tourism platforms, digital marketing tools.","People":"Local communities, tourism industry workers, conservation organizations.","Owner":"Government, tourism industry associations, conservation agencies."}]}
